trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound" /> 事件或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> class is used to represent the method that handles the events in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler>类用于表示处理下表中的事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item is clicked.
This event is commonly used to synchronize a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control with another control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于同步<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>与页面上的另一个控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项绑定到数据时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于在呈现之前修改菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> delegate to programmatically register an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler>要以编程方式注册的事件处理程序委托<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例站点站点地图数据复制到一个名为 Web.sitemap 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。
